name: Dark Web Investigations
description: Techniques for tracking illegal activities on hidden networks and marketplaces.

cards.title: TOR Network Tracking & OSINT
cards.description: Using open-source intelligence (OSINT) to monitor illegal activities on TOR.
bulletpoints: Identify common TOR marketplaces for illicit activities
Use blockchain analysis to track cryptocurrency transactions
Deploy darknet crawlers to index and map hidden services

cards.title: Darknet Investigation Methods
cards.description: Covertly gathering intelligence from forums, vendors, and communication channels.
bulletpoints: Establish undercover identities and maintain operational security
Extract intelligence from forum conversations and vendor reviews
Trace illegal digital goods, cyberweapons, and stolen data
